lines.gurmukhi: XwhI msqk pyK rIJq ko pRwn nwQ hwQ AwpnY bnwie iqlk idKwvqy
lines.transliteration_english: Yaahee Masatak Paykh Reejhat Ko Praan Naada , Haad Aapanai Banaai Tilak Dikhaavatay ?

Shabad OS B.translation: My beloved master used to feel pleased seeing my forehead. Adoring it, he used to put mark of consecration on it and ask me to see it.

lines.gurmukhi: XwhI msqk Dwir hsq kml piRX pRym kiQ kiQ kih mwnn mnwvqy
lines.transliteration_english: Yaahee Masatak Dhaari Hasat Kamal Priya , Praym Kadi Kadi Kahi Maanan Manaavatay ?

Shabad OS B.translation: My beloved then used to keep her soft hands on my forehead and with loving stories used to please me-the arrogant one.

lines.gurmukhi: XwhI msqk nwhI nwhI kir BwgqI hI Dwie Dwie hyq kir aurih lgwvqy
lines.transliteration_english: Yaahee Masatak Naahee Naahee Kari Bhaagatee Hee , Dhaai Dhaai Hayt Kari Urahi Lagaavatay ?

Shabad OS B.translation: I used to run away saying No! No! and chasing me, he used to hug me very lovingly resting my forehead on his chest.

lines.gurmukhi: soeI msqk Duin Duin pun roie auTON s√çpny hU nwQ nwih drs idKwvqy ]576]
lines.transliteration_english: Soee Masatak Dhouni Dhouni Poun Roi Outthaoun , Svapanay Hoo Naad Naahi Daras Dikhaavatay ?576?

Shabad OS B.translation: But now on separation, I lament and cry with the same forehead, but my beloved master does not even appear in my dreams.  (576)
